description
Feel like Ryu from Street Fighter IV with this alternate wig! It even includes the trademark red headband! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Ryu de Street Fighter IV avec cette perruque alternative ! Le fameux bandeau rouge est compris ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit dieser alternativen Perücke wie Ryu aus Street Fighter IV! Sie hat sogar das typische rote Stirnband! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Ryu di Street Fighter IV con questa parrucca! Include anche la tipica fascia rossa! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte esta peluca alternativa y siéntete como Ryu de Street Fighter IV! (Cinta roja incluida) Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 リュウになりきることができるウィッグのアレンジ ver.！赤いハチマキがトレードマーク！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 류가 되는 가발 어렌지 ver.！ 붉은 머리띠가 트레이드 마크! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Ryu from Street Fighter IV with this alternate wig! It even includes the trademark red headband! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
